## Codebase Overview

This is a **Next.js 15 portfolio application** with the following key characteristics:

### Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 15.3.2 with Turbopack
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Database**: Drizzle ORM with libSQL/Neon serverless support
- **UI**: Radix UI components, Tailwind CSS v4, Framer Motion
- **AI Integration**: Anthropic SDK and Vercel AI SDK
- **Testing**: Vitest with React Testing Library

### Project Structure
```
src/
├── __tests__/     # Test files
├── app/           # Next.js App Router pages
│   ├── about/
│   ├── api/
│   ├── blog/
│   ├── contact/
│   ├── projects/
│   └── search/
├── components/    # React components (38 items)
├── config/        # Configuration files
├── db/            # Database schemas and utilities
├── hooks/         # Custom React hooks
├── lib/           # Utility libraries (19 items)
├── prompts/       # AI prompt templates
├── styles/        # Additional styles
└── types/         # TypeScript type definitions
```

### Documentation
The `docs/` folder is comprehensive, containing:
- Architecture docs (PRD, MEMORY, COORDINATION)
- Feature docs (SEARCH_SYSTEM, CLI_GUIDE)
- Sprint planning and capstone documents
- Style and UI system guides
- Test plans and Figma integration guides

### Critical Files for Implementation

- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/layout.tsx` - Root layout for the application
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/db/` - Database schema and connection setup
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/lib/` - Core utilities and business logic
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/docs/PRD.md` - Product requirements document
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/package.json` - Dependencies and scripts configuration
